structure.unit: Jurisdiction And Emblems Of The Commonwealth, The General Court, Statutes And Public Documents

law.catch_line: Admission Of Persons Listed To Take Seats As Representatives
law.text: The persons named on the lists delivered to the sergeant-at-arms shall be admitted to take seats as members in the representativesâ€™ chamber on said first Wednesday of January or thereafter during the terms for which they are elected.
